#summary Proposed terms for IoosTech SWE element definitions
#labels Definitions,SWE,Featured

= Introduction - Deprecated (Moved to [http://mmisw.org/orr/#http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type MMI!])=

[http://mmisw.org/orr/#http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type]


The following table contains the proposed terms used to indicate specific ioosTech conventions for the use of standard SWE elements. For instance what to expect in a given dataRecord based on the elements definition. The links give examples where the term is used in the mileStone1.0 templates but line numbers may be approximate. 

= Element Definitions* =
|| Term || Description ||  Reference || MMI URI ||
|| observationRecord	 || The root element of a SWE result block in an ioosTech OM getObservation response which contains exactly two fields for static and dynamic data. || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-SingleStation-TimeSeriesProfile.xml#11 dataRecord] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/ObservationRecord ||
|| stations || A SWE dataRecord element which contains an array of station fields. || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-MultiStation-TimeSeries.xml#34 dataRecord] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/stations ||
|| station || A SWE dataRecord element which must contain the defined elements: stationID, platformLocation, and sensors.  || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-MultiStation-TimeSeries.xml#40 dataRecord] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/station ||
|| sensors || A SWE dataRecord element which contains one or more sensor fields. It can be used in a static context to define a dataRecord or in the dynamic context to define a dataChoice element.  ||[https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-MultiStation-TimeSeries.xml#100 dataRecord] [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-MultiStation-TimeSeries.xml#365 dataChoice] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/sensors ||
|| sensor || A SWE dataRecord element which describes data from a single physical device. In the static context it contains the sensorID and location. In the dynamic context it is the record descriptor which specifies the units and definition of the observed quantity, while the values are block encoded separately. || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-MultiStation-TimeSeries.xml#106 dataRecord] [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-MultiStation-TimeSeries.xml#374 dataRecord] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/sensor ||
|| sensorObservationCollection || The SWE dataArray element which contains the dynamic data. The element type of the array is a dataRecord containing a dataChoice item for each sensor. These sensors' observations are encoded in the values block. ||  [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-MultiStation-TimeSeries.xml#340 dataArray] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/sensorObservationCollection ||
|| sensorObservations || The SWE dataRecord element that contains all field descriptors in the dynamic dataArray. The first of these is time, followed by a dataChoice element with items for each sensor. ||  [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-MultiStation-TimeSeries.xml#351 dataRecord] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/sensorObservations  ||
|| profile || A SWE dataArray element used to express a profile of observations from a single sensor. The array count is always block encoded, and each encoding of the array must contain an index reference to the previously defined profile height or bin. || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-SingleStation-TimeSeriesProfile.xml#382 dataArray] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/profile ||
|| profileObservation || A SWE dataRecord element that describes one entry in a profile array. It must contain a height or bin index value and one or more observation values. ||[https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-SingleStation-TimeSeriesProfile.xml#439 dataRecord] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/profileObservation ||
|| profileIndex || A SWE Count element that expresses the relationship between a profileObservation element and the profile bin or height previously defined in the profile sensor's static data. || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-SingleStation-TimeSeriesProfile.xml#446 Count] ||  http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/binIndex ||
|| profileBins || A SWE dataArray element that describes the bins of a profiling instrument such as an ADCP sensor which makes volume average measurements over a depth range (bin).  || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-SingleStation-TimeSeriesProfile.xml#188 dataArray] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/profileBins ||
|| profileHeights || A SWE dataArray element that describes the heights of observations made by a profiling sensor. || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-SingleStation-TimeSeriesProfile.xml#294 dataArray] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/profileHeights ||
|| profileBinEdges || A SWE quantityRange element that describes the upper and lower bounds of a profile bin. || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-SingleStation-TimeSeriesProfile.xml#214 quantityRange] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/profileBinEdges ||
|| observationTimeRange || A SWE timeRange element that describes the valid time range over which observations from a sensor or station exist. || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SML-DescribeSensor-Station.xml#112 timeRange] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/observationTimeRange ||
|| recordQuality || A type of SWE Category element used to define the quality of an entire record by applying it to the time element. || [https://code.google.com/p/ioostech/source/browse/trunk/templates/Milestone1.0/SWE-MultiStation-TimeSeries_QC.xml#381 Category] || http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/recordQuality ||

* SWE Element names are lowerCamelCase because CamelCase is reserved for wiki links...
